PassiveDesc.Name: Full Trigrams
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using 2 distinct Trigram pages, gain 1 "Hexagram" Page in the next Scene Hexagram Page can enhance slotted combat pages on play, the enhancement effect is based on the order of previous Trigram Pages. Each page can only be enhanced at most by 1 "Hexagram" Page

PassiveDesc.Name: Hana for All
PassiveDesc.Desc: When gaining Strength, Endurance, Protection, or Stagger Protection through Combat Pages: give the same status effect to a random other ally as well. When obtaining "Hexagram" Pages, give the same page to a random other ally as well.

PassiveDesc.Name: All for Hana
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character took damage from attacks on the previous Scene, change this character's resistances against the type that dealt the most damage to "Endured" for the Scene. Share the resistances modification with two random other allies as well. (Applies separately for physical and Stagger damage)
